And David Friedberg is here, the queen of quinoa, spacking everything in sight, living the life, calling in from a nondescript Ritz-Carlton room, it appears to be. And of course, the dictator himself, Chamath Palihapitiya, cackling like a fool. Welcome back, everybody.
